transcript.text: If you face a potential conflict, disclose it!

contentBackground.img: Woman on phone with Human Resoures

panelText.text: Conflicts of interest are not always obvious.

• However, don’t be tempted to wait and see, and delay disclosing the situation. Our process is designed to help Johnson Controls properly evaluate such situations.
  • If in doubt:
    • seek guidance from your Manager, Human Resources, or the Law or Compliance team
    • consult the Johnson Controls Conflicts of Interest Policy
    • fill out a Conflicts of Interest Form online at:
      http://complianceforms.jci.com
